name: .FXT File Extension
type_name: Grand Theft Auto Fake Text File
summary: Learn about .FXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text message file used by Grand Theft Auto with the CLEO GxtHook.cleo plug-in installed; saved in a plain text format and contains a text message that is sent to the player during GTA gameplay; used for pager and phone texts in the game.

content: In order to display text messages in GTA, FXT files must be saved to the \​CLEO_TEXT\​ directory within the CLEO installation folder.
NOTE: CLEO is a set of Dynamic Link Libraries (.DLL files) that have the file extension ".cleo." The GxtHook.cleo library must be installed in order for FXT files to be loaded into the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
